title: Ai Jingling Le Ji Er
synopsis: The Tammy Witch of the Academy of Magic asks Le Jier to take the angel of love to the earth to complete the task of collecting the energy of love, so Le Jier stumbles to the earth with the angel of love and the magic box. The Demon Queen also awakened from the seal, which had a huge impact on the earth and the Magic Academy! In order to save her friends, Le Jier decided to sacrifice herself, but she did not expect that this would instead collect all kinds of love. Family, friendship, love, and the magic box was filled with love, emitting powerful love energy. Finally defeated the demon queen. (translated from iqiyi)
